Package commands

The commands package contains the list of command executor classes for the fotoshop application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command
    Command is an abstract class in charge of retrieving and setting user inputs to their corresponding field values (secondWord and thirdWord).
    CommandWords
    The CommandWords Class holds an enumeration of all command words that are valid.
    FlipHorizontalCommand
    FlipHorizontalCommand is an executor class which flips the image currently being edited horizontally.
    FlipVerticalCommand
    FlipVerticalCommand is an executor class which flips the image currently being edited vertically.
    GetImageCommand
    GetImageCommand is an executor class which retrieves an image from the cache memory.
    HelpCommand
    HelpCommand is an executor class which returns a help message to help the user navigate and use the application.
    LookCommand
    LookCommand is an executor class which returns the list of filters currently applied to the image being edited.
    MonoCommand
    MonoCommand is an executor class which converts the image to its monochromatic version.
    OpenCommand
    OpenCommand is an executor class which loads an image file located in the root directory to the application.
    PutImageCommand
    PutImageCommand is an executor class which saves a copy of the current loaded image to the image cache.
    QuitCommand
    QuitCommand is an executor class which terminates the application upon user request.
    Rotate90Command
    Rotate90Command is an executor class which rotates the image currently being edited to 90 degrees clockwise.
    SaveCommand
    SaveCommand is an executor class which saves the image file currently being edited to the project's root directory.
    ScriptCommand
    ScriptCommand is an executor class which opens and executes a script text file that contains a series of commands.
    UndoCommand
    UndoCommand is an executor class which removes the previously added filter to the image.
    ViewImageCacheCommand
    ViewImageCacheCommand is an executor class which returns the list of image files currently saved in the image cache.

Package commands Description

The commands package contains the list of command executor classes for the fotoshop application. It uses the Command Pattern for a better segregation of commands and a cleaner approach to the implementation design.
